title: MAIRA at RRG24: A specialised large multimodal model for radiology report generation
details: S Srivastav, M Ranjit, F Pérez-García, K Bouzid… - Proceedings of the 23rd …, 2024
abstract: This paper discusses the participation of the MSR MAIRA team in the Large-Scale Radiology Report Generation Shared Task Challenge, as part of the BioNLP workshop at ACL 2024. We present a radiology-specific multimodal model designed …
